official_title: Evaluating the Impact of Limited vs. Intense Post-Operative Surveillance on Patient-Reported Outcomes in Patients With Soft Tissue Sarcoma
inclusion_criteria:
* â‰¥18 years old
* Completion of sarcoma therapy (chemotherapy, radiation therapy and/or surgery) within 8-14 weeks of study enrollment

Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Documented metastatic disease at the time of enrollment
* Non-English-speaking patients

Pregnant women will be included in this clinical trial.
